Name: Blockee - Sliding Puzzle
About the game: Blockee is a sliding block puzzle inspired by the old Klotski puzzle, bringing you to a modern and relaxing perspective. Slide the blocks Colorful blocks Key Features: 100 levels; Colorful blocks; Everything in the game was made with love; Calm and relaxing soundtrack; Can you find the correct path?
